ygData.subject: Re: Looting Issue
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Any time I add someone with a name like that, I declare reverse alphabetical looting.  A lot of times I ll declare reverse alpha when someone has a name
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 11 Nov 1999, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
>
> What galls me the most are the rash of characters named "Aaaba" and
> "Aaada" (the three a's is NOT a typo here). Obviously these character names
> were decided purely to go first in alpha loot. With a character name

Any time I add someone with a name like that, I declare
reverse alphabetical looting. A lot of times I'll declare
reverse alpha when someone has a name that begins with X or Z
or something like that just to let them be first for a change.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
